name: # - No Download, so no change in CleanLinks.
# - If no Download, then Clean not changed.
# Only download if no local links +LoadOptions -SaveOptions
# - Merge 3 inputs as described by updateLinks(), except
# - No SaveOptions, so if Local set, then no Download.
# - If no Download, then Clean not changed.
# - No SaveOptions, so Conflict never displayed.
# - Always Download, update Clean if success.
# - Same as with SaveOptions, because remote file is always taken, there is no need to change it.
# - Config is now readonly in Settings.
